std::vector< GLuint > List

Detailed Description

class GLObject: abstract base class for 3D objects. provides a glList containing the base primitive and a routine to draw it.
the Draw () routine must be implemented in the derived classes.

Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>
